narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Temple University Hospital INC is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Philadelphia, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $116.5M in Medicaid payments across 1.3M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $116.5M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,568 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
